text: int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; main ( ) { int n1 ; while ( scanf ( "%d" , & n1 ) != - 1 ) { int n , i = 0 , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , s ( 0 , 0 , n ) ) ; } return 0 ; } int s ( int i , int j , int n ) { int t1 , t2 ; if ( i >= n ) return 0 ; t1 = s ( i + 1 , j , n ) ; t2 = s ( i + 1 , j + 1 , n ) ; return t1 > t2 ? t1 : t2 + a [ i ] [ j ] ; }
